title: How do you put a picture in a discussion?

replies.body:
You can't directly embed a picture in a post, but if you post an image link alone like below, it will show up as a preview that others can open or visit.



http://imgur.com/a/zLUau




I hope that helps!
Hey can you help me if you are rioter? need it ASAP?

If it is account sensitive information, then contact the support team

Otherwise, there are plenty of other players on the boards willing to help c:

Thanks :D I contacted support btw here is it 


http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/ZkRB4wRY-well-banned-my-fault-i-guess?comment=00020000
